DOC.brief_summary: This multi-center , prospective , single arm , non-randomized study evaluate safety efficacy Veniti Vici™ Venous Stent System relation pre-defined Objective Performance goal . The follow-up period 60 month .
DOC.brief_title: VIRTUS : An Evaluation Veniti Vici™ Venous Stent System Patients With Chronic Iliofemoral Venous Outflow Obstruction
DOC.detailed_description: The objective prospective study ass safety efficacy Veniti Vici™ Venous Stent System achieve patency target venous lesion patient clinically significant chronic non-malignant obstruction iliofemoral venous outflow tract .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria PreProcedure Criteria : Age ≥ 18 year Willing capable comply followup evaluation specify time Able willing provide write informed consent prior studyspecific procedure Presence unilateral , clinically significant , chronic nonmalignant obstruction common femoral vein , external iliac vein , common iliac vein , combination thereof , define ≥50 % reduction target vessel lumen diameter ( measure venogram procedure ) Clinically significant venous obstruction define meet least one follow clinical indicator : Clinical severity class CEAP classification ≥3 VCSS Pain Score ≥2 Negative pregnancy test female childbearing potential Intention stent target lesion Veniti Vici Venous Stent Exclusion Criteria PreProcedure Criteria : Presence history clinically significant pulmonary embolus within 6 month prior enrollment . Venous obstruction extend inferior vena cava ( IVC ) Contralateral disease common femoral vein , external iliac vein , common iliac vein , combination thereof plan treatment within 30 day subject enrollment Life expectancy < 12 month Female childbearing potential pregnant plan become pregnant duration clinical study Uncontrolled active coagulopathy OR know , uncorrectable bleed diathesis follow definition : Uncorrected INR ≥2.0 aPTT ≥1.5 X normal local lab value Platelet count < 80,000 Uncorrected hemoglobin ≤ 9 g/dL Patients estimate glomerular filtration rate ( eGFR ) < 30 mL/min . In patient diabetes mellitus , eGFR < 45 mL/min . Known hypersensitivity nickel titanium Contrast agent allergy manage adequately premedication Intended concurrent thrombolysis thrombectomy procedure OR intend plan ( within 30 day ) adjuvant procedure creation temporary arteriovenous fistula , placement IVC filter , endovenectomy saphenous vein ablation Current recent ( within 30 day ) active participation another drug device clinical trial ( Participation observational study acceptable . ) Patient judged poor candidate primary investigator Patients prior surgical endovascular procedure target vessel [ Note : Patients catheterdirected mechanical thrombolysis target vessel DVT least 3 month ( 90 day ) prior VIRTUS index procedure may include trial . ] Exclusion Criteria IntraProcedural Criteria : Patients lesion traverse guide wire . Patients obstruction extends inferior vena cava level less trochanter . Patients whose vein diameter within limit state current Instructions Use determine venogram . Patients meet venogram binary stenosis definition , determine treat physician .
